snippet.title: Game Boy Color Longplay [133] Action Man: Search For Base X
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: RickyC

Surprised how long this game went on for, whenever I thought it was over another level appeared. It was quite fun and I liked the puzzle elements to work out what you needed to beat each mission. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
